title: Depressor Anguli Oris muscle

# OIAN

| Muscle  | Origin | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|------|--------|-------|----------|--------|
| [Depressor Anguli Oris]({{< var ref-depressor-anguli-oris.path >}}) | {{< var ref-depressor-anguli-oris.origin >}} | {{< var ref-depressor-anguli-oris.insertion >}} | {{< var ref-depressor-anguli-oris.nerve >}} | {{< var ref-depressor-anguli-oris.action >}} |

# Origin {#origin}
Mandible (oblique line below canine, premolar, and 1st molar teeth) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion {#insertion}
Skin at corner of the mouth; Blends with [orbicularis oris]({{< var ref-orbicularis-oris >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation {#innervation}

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action {#action}
Pulls angle of mouth inferiorly and laterally @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Clinical Significance
